reporter_caption.center: YANKEE MILK, INC. v. HUTCHINS, 138 Vt. 615 (1980)

caption.center: YANKEE MILK, INC. v. Fred HUTCHINS and Frances Hutchins

opinion.opinion_text: Judgment of dismissal reversed. Cause remanded for evidentiary hearing under V.R.C.P. 43(e). See J. O. Bilodeau Co. v.Reed, 119 Vt. 342, 346, 126 A.2d 118, 120 (1956).
